      • getTriggerForName

        public TriggerManager.Trigger getTriggerForName(String name)
        The naming follows this rule: triggers saved in the NamedTriggers folder will have name exactly same as the file name. However, if you have another folder under NamedTriggers, and the trigger is saved under that folder, you need to specify the folder in front of the file name. For example, if you have your trigger path NamedTriggers/SomeFolder/AnotherFolder/yourtrigger, then the name will be like this: NamedTriggers:SomeFolder:AnotherFolder:yourtrigger.
        Parameters:
        name - the trigger name including path if any exists
        Returns:
        the Trigger; null if no such trigger
